examples.korean: Magma is called lava when it reaches the earth's surface. 발음듣기 마그마가 지표면에 도달했을 때 용암이라고 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Magma is called lava when it reaches the earth's surface. 발음

examples.korean: A little farther away from the earth, the air gets cooler. 발음듣기 지표면으로부터 멀리 떨어져 있을수록 공기는 더 차가워진다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A little farther away from the earth, the air gets cooler. 발음

examples.korean: However, it is incapable of observing the surface of the Earth on cloudy days or at night. 발음듣기 그러나 구름 낀 날이나 밤에는, 지표면을 관측하는 것이 불가능하다. Neungyule
examples.english: However, it is incapable of observing the surface of the Earth on cloudy days or at night. 발음

examples.korean: More than 500 volcanoes are known to have erupted on the surface in the history of the Earth. 발음듣기 지구의 역사상 500개 이상의 화산이 지표면에서 폭발한 것 으로 알려졌다. Neungyule
examples.english: More than 500 volcanoes are known to have erupted on the surface in the history of the Earth. 발음

examples.korean: In the Netherlands, the ground is below sea level. 발음듣기 네덜란드는 지표면이 해수면보다 낮다 Neungyule
examples.english: In the Netherlands, the ground is below sea level. 발음
